document_data.name: ''Staff of Eyes''
document_data.mainbody: A '''staff of eyes''' was a magical staff with powers of vision.
document_data.Description: It was a spiraling staff with a large piece of [[amber]] at the top, and inlaid with [[silver]].
document_data.Powers: It contained the ''[[arcane eye]]'', ''[[Remove blindness or deafness|remove blindness]]'', and ''[[see invisibility]]'' spells.
